data.title: Maya the bee 2. The honey games
data.meta_description: When a tribute announcement demanding half the hive's honey threatens the very survival of the hive, Maya and her sidekick Willy defy the queen's orders and go to Buzztropolis to confront the Empress. The Empress invites them to participate in the Honey Games; however, she explains that if they win, all is forgiven, but if they lose, she will take all of the summer honey.
